short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically scan and parse all links for malicious content and flag them down, all in the background.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Safe Links uses Google Safe Search to verify the authenticity and security of all links on a given web page. Using background chrome processes, Safe Links does this all while using no more processing power than loading a normal web page. 

Simply install the extension, and you're done! The extension is automatically enabled and will start protecting your sessions, no need to even pin the extension! Selecting the extension will allow you to enable or disable the extension with the click of a button. 

For questions or concerns contact:
adamspera@hotmail.com
